org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.stream

Interface CameraStreamSource

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TFObjectDetector, VuforiaLocalizer

    public interface CameraStreamSource
    Interface representing an on-demand source of frames (i.e., bitmaps).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getFrameBitmap(<any> continuation)
      Requests a single frame bitmap.

    • Method Detail

      • getFrameBitmap

        void getFrameBitmap(<any> continuation)
        Requests a single frame bitmap. Here's a brief example implementation using VuforiaLocalizer: 
         @Override
 public void getFrameBitamp(Continuation<? extends Consumer<Bitmap>> continuation) {
     vuforia.getFrameOnce(Continuation.createTrivial(new Consumer<Frame>() {
         @Override
         public void accept(final Frame frame) {
             continuation.dispatch(new ContinuationResult<Consumer<Bitmap>>() {
                 @Override
                 public void handle(Consumer<Bitmap> consumer) {
                     consumer.accept(vuforia.convertFrameToBitmap(frame));
                 }
             });
         }
     }));
 }
        Parameters:
        continuation - frame bitmap consumer continuation
        See Also:
        org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.navigation.VuforiaLocalizer#getFrameOnce(Continuation)
